publicwhip.spmotion: *S2M-2018.1 Bill Aitken: Business Motionâ€”As an amendment to motion (S2M-2018) in the name of Ms Margaret Curran, under Thursday 25 November 2004, leave out "3.00 pm Executive Debate on Violence Against Women" and insert "3.00 pm Ministerial Statement on Efficient Government 3.45 pm Executive Debate on Violence Against Women" Supported by: Lord James Douglas-Hamilton*, David McLetchie*, Mr Ted Brocklebank*, Margaret Mitchell*, Mrs Nanette Milne*, Miss Annabel Goldie*, David Mundell*, Mr Brian Monteith*, Mr David Davidson*, Murdo Fraser*
